tagblock.name: Bitmap Widgets
tagblock.comment: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.

tagblock.name: Effect
tagblock.comment: allow the scaling, rotation, and offsetting of widgets

tagblock.name: Text Widgets
tagblock.comment: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.

bit.name: String Is A Number
bit.tooltip: treats the inputted string id as a function name, not a string name

bit.name: Force 2-Digit Number
bit.tooltip: when used in combination with above, forces output to be a 2-digit numberwith leading zeros if necessary

bit.name: Force 3-Digit Number
bit.tooltip: same as above, but with 3 digits instead of 2

tagblock.name: Effect
tagblock.comment: allow the scaling, rotation, and offsetting of widgets

plugin.comment: only relevant to new hud tags for weapons

int16.name: Low Clip Cutoff
int16.tooltip: the cutoff for showing the reload dashlight

int16.name: Low Ammo Cutoff
int16.tooltip: the cutoff for showing the low ammo dashlight

float32.name: Age Cutoff
float32.tooltip: the age cutoff for showing the low battery dashlight

tagblock.name: Screen Effect Widgets
tagblock.comment: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.
